ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Trimaris] Savawulf's Ransom
ygData.msgSnippet: By the way, let me clarify a few things so there are no misunderstandings.  The prson behind Lady Kethry and I are really good friends out of game.  Back
ygData.messageBody:
By the way, let me clarify a few things so there are no misunderstandings.  The prson behind Lady Kethry and I are really good friends out of game.  Back before I went to Japan I gave the item to her for safe keeping.  It was my understanding when I came back that she would return the item.  Because she's such a kind hearted sweet person, she has decided to toy with me a little and has put the item up for ransom.  I'm merely playing along in character in order to get it back.  Nothing was actually stolen, nor is any ill will meant toward anyone.  This is merely a sub plot to things that are going on in game.
 
The file will be uploaded to the EQ-Trimaris site if anyone actually wants to check it out.
 
 
Sava
 
 
 
----- Original Message
Here's the scoop:
 
Among my many characters I play a half-elf ranger named Savawulf on the Cazic Thule server.  Savawulf is a member of the Draconis Rampant guild.  Recently some events have come to pass where Savawulf was wronged by another member of the DR guild.  An evil dark elf necromancer named Kethryveris Ashkeveron.  Watch out for her if you ever meet her.  She's very evil and cannot be trusted!!!
 
The story is thatSavawulf had a very valuable item stolen from him in real life - out of game that is.  Now, the person behind the evil dark elf lady is holding this item for ransom.  Seeing that I have  no reprieve, I feel it is in my best interest for the safety of this item to be returned that I just comply with her wishes.  Therefore, For the full story, plese go to the following website:
 
http://www.geocities.com/savawulf
 
You can find the details there.   Incidentally, I also cross posted this to the Draconis Rampant message board, and curiously enough, the Savatage fan page messageboard. 
 
I'm afraid to see what kind of responses I get.  I'll probably end up getting sued by the band for copying their song without permission, but that's a chance I'm going to have to take if I am to get this very valuable item back.
 
 
If this hsan't piqued your curiosity enough, I don't know what will.
 
Check out the page.
 
Respectfully,
Savawulf Tageric
15th Season HEF RNG
Cazic thule server
